tooltips.help: Please enter the build/release for which you want to optimize the test case executions then,click on next.
tooltips.title: Input Tab

tooltips.help: Please select the test enviroment for which you want to perform the test executions then,click on next
tooltips.title: Test Bed Selection

tooltips.help: These tab shows you what are the recommended test cases.Click on next to provide the contraints on optimizing the test case executions
tooltips.title: Recommended Test Cases

tooltips.help: Please enter your constraints of time and resources for which you want to optimise the test case executions. Click on Fetch Test Cases to get the optimized test case executions
tooltips.title: Test Details Tab

tooltips.help: This tab shows you the optimised test execution details given you constraints.The test cases are grouped into diiferent groups. Click on the numbers in the groups to get the detaiks of the test execution
tooltips.title: Optimised test results

tooltips.help: These tab shows you the optimised test case executions given your constraints.
tooltips.title: Optimised test executions
